logic

Class TraceElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.TraceElement

  • public class TraceElement
extends java.lang.Object
    A TraceElement stores all relevant data to recreate or undo a move (a change to the data-model), made in the game.
    Author:
    Moritz Rehschuh

      • TraceElement

        protected TraceElement(Pos oldPos,
                       Pos newPos)
        The Standart-Constructor for a TraceElement.
        Parameters:
        oldPos - The original Pos of the piece moved
        newPos - The new Pos of the piece moved

    • Method Detail

      • addEnPassantInfo

        protected void addEnPassantInfo(Piece piece)
        In case of an EnPassant, use this method to add further information to the TraceElement
        Parameters:
        piece - The slain piece

      • addRochadeInfo

        protected void addRochadeInfo(Pos oldPos,
                              Pos newPos)
        In case of an Rochade, use this method to add further information to the TraceElement
        Parameters:
        oldPos - The old Pos of the moves Rook
        newPos - The new Pos of the moved Rook

      • addPawnUpgradeInfo

        protected void addPawnUpgradeInfo(java.lang.String type)
        In case of an Promotion, use this method to add further information to the TraceElement
        Parameters:
        type - A String to mark the chosen upgrade

        public Pawn[] getPawns()
        A Getter-method

        A Getter-method

      • getRochadeTarget

        public Pos getRochadeTarget()
        A Getter-method
        Returns:

        public java.lang.String getPawnUpgradeType()
        A Getter-method
